title: chestcommands无法打开菜单
author: Extreme-极度
txt_content:
为什么 chestcommands无法打开菜单 我确定是配置好了


下面是设置
######################
#+                  +#
#   MENU SETTINGS    #
#+                  +#
######################

menu-settings:

  # name - appears as the title - REQUIRED
  name: '&1服务器菜单'

  # rows - the number of rows of the chest - REQUIRED
  rows: 4

  # command - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  command: 'menu'

  # open-with-item - OPTIONAL (you can remove this or
  # set the item to 0)
  open-with-item:
    item-id: 347
    left-click: false
    right-click: true


######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


A1:
  NAME: '&e主城'
  LORE:
  ID: 1
  COMMAND: 'spawn'
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1


A2:
  NAME: '&e生存界'
  LORE:
  ID: 2
  COMMAND: 'mv tp sc'
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 1


A3:
  NAME: '&e资源界'
  LORE:
  ID: 3
  COMMAND: 'mv tp zy'
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 1


A4:
  NAME: '&eRPG'
  LORE:
  ID: 279
  COMMAND: ''
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 1


A9:
  NAME: '&e查看金钱'
  LORE:
    - '{money}'
  ID: 266
  COMMAND: 'money'
  POSITION-X: 9
  POSITION-Y: 1


B1:
  NAME: '&e抽奖'
  LORE:
  ID: 154
  COMMAND: ''
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 2


B2:
  NAME: '&e环球市场'
  LORE:
  ID: 146
  COMMAND: 'market listings'
  POSITION-X: 2
  POSITION-Y: 2


B3:
  NAME: '&e点卷商城'
  LORE:
  ID: 264
  COMMAND: 'bs open dqsc'
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 2


B4:
  NAME: '&e抽奖箱子购买'
  LORE:
    - '未完成'
  ID: 146
  COMMAND: ''
  POSITION-X: 4
  POSITION-Y: 2

replies.author: 凯瑞
replies.txt_content: 右键之后显示那串白色的？？？

replies.author: MC_ZXCC
replies.txt_content:
open-with-item:
    id: 347
    left-click: false
    right-click: true
而不是item-id

replies.author: Extreme-极度
replies.txt_content:
紫色温馨 发表于 2016-4-30 20:47
把item-id改成id试试？
不是 我设置了 menu为指令都不行 = = 我直接输入menu都进不去

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: yjz1368568129
replies.txt_content:
换一个版本的插件
你输入/cc open 菜单名字看看能不能打开菜单
